A

addJFrame() - Method in class DigitalDoily
Creates the frame and resizes it based on the screen size Then adds the panels.
addLastPointsToImage() - Method in class DrawingPanel
Adds the last points to the image by drawing drawing a line between the current point and the previous one.
addNewPicturePanel(String) - Method in class DigitalDoily
Adds one picture from the path to the current arrayList of images.
addPicture(String) - Method in class PicturePanel
Adds the picture from the path path to the instance of the class.
addPictures(int) - Method in class DigitalDoily
Adds the picture from the save file to the drawing panel from the n position.
addPicturesFromFile(String) - Method in class DigitalDoily
Adds the pictures from file to the picturePanel.
addStuffToControlPanel() - Method in class DigitalDoily
Adds all the buttons and functionality behind them to the controlPanel.
addStuffToPicturePanel(JPanel) - Method in class DigitalDoily
Adds the buttons and panels to the picture panel at the button of the window.
